pages.text:
Title: OA02.15. Anti-inflammatory and anti-proliferative activity of terpenoid fraction isolated from plectranthus hadiensis.

Abstract: Purpose:
To evaluate the use of this plant in Ayurvedic formulation for treating various inflammation related ailments.
